body:
You know pals? 
Bitch is bitch, nothing more. 
This is trash, but i know the art so good, so i cum from this. 
But man,.. imagine your gf just get gangbanged, and creampie from many dude. 
And then, you still accept her? 
FCKING CRAZY. 
I love ntr, i love vanilla,. 
But this doujin (story 1)
Combine NTR with vanilla ending, and the result is.. TRASH. Come on there is no way you guys cry from story 1? 
Like " oh! This girl has been saved! " 
No no no,. Like i said. Bitch is bitch. 
I just really angry , why the fuck that story 1, with good ntr plot, end like that ? 
Fcking shit this is doujin, this is fap material.
Bullshit, bullshit

stupidity of this doujin is same as ntr shits
atleast dialogues were saving grace
A twisted but great ending
79 C NA H
ntr happy ending = trash🗑️🤮
Fucking stupid. Retard author.

It was perfect before the gang rape, sigh I don't get why authors like to ruin stories like this. Sure it had a happy ending but that doesn't wash off the bad taste entirely. Would've been acceptable if he reported them or if the rapists faced some sort of consequence but that's too much to ask in a doujin
@The Shrimpster just read the whole thing before rating something there might be a good ending or something
easily dropped this on the first page of the gangrape. beta mc and theres even a rimjob. one of the worst hentais ive read
this is beautiful
Character development 100
Thank goodness that this didnt end into an ntr
This was a rollercoaster of emotions, 10/10
one of the few author who can do NTR is still make me fav cuz it was a typical NTR and had a happy ending
Is all good but when gang rapethis become shit

This is one of the manga that made me a fan of Ootori Mahiro. The story is really good. When I've read the rape scene, I was afraid that the story's ending will be a sad one. But Mahiro-sensei still managed to create a happy ending. His recent works is on Fakku. Bought them all and it's really worth it. Kinda wish they'll sell his past books like this one.

you know had things gone differently, I could imagine instead of the gangbang scene, we could've had Seiichi getting a text from Reo to go to the hotel we see in chapter 3  and walk in on Himena eating her out this then leads to a threesome instead

Ah 
Atvleast its a happy ending 
It make the pain more bearable
Ah, one of the very first hentais I've read. How nostalgic.

Dissapointing I don't mind ntr but I like to keep it separate from my vanilla stories. this shit just ruins the entire book for me. Not gonna look back I will try to forget about it and hope I never come across it again.

Well that turned quite suddenly
Also props to seiichi for fighting those guys off (pg 108 has him looking rather ruffed up, implying a skirmish)
Rape scene completely ruined what was otherwise a good bdsm centric hentai, why do people do this shit?
I know when someone orchestrates the gang rape of someone I love I'm super ok with letting them hang around later. Very forgiving, these folk
@FapOS a good one would be Kizashi https://nhentai.net/g/226386/
Came for the hentai stayed for the plot
The last chapter is also somewhat an NTR but here the masturbating girl is the cuck, the Watashi no, Onii-chan doujin is also a perfect example of that, we need more NTR where the girl is the cuck

What an emotional ride took me 2yrs to remember something about ntr and mc actually does shit and romance douche bag girl and I've finally found the hentai that I've read around 2yrs ago took a few hrs but it was worth it.
I'm just happy they got a happy ending after the rape scene
the rape scene were so cruel... my heart broke for real... i just got sad
It's  also strange how everyone has 8inch dicks and double cups but hey what can you do it's art.

its strange how in hentai, any person who rapes someone just doesn't get shit happened to them. cuz you know i would suspect there be laws about this shit. its actually extremely unrealistic how this just goes one.
That rape scene was fucked up... Ruined the whole thing for me.
@vptwarrior sadly in hentai, the bad guy mostly never being punished
in the human pet story, i hope that black haired girl gets raped for what she did.
